Items.Title: Oversight - Improving Workforce Retention in the Civil Service.
Items.MatterName: Oversight - Improving Workforce Retention in the Civil Service.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to civil service examination fee waivers

Resolution calling on the New York State Legislature to pass, and the New York State Governor to sign, S. 1828 /A. 3103, which would eliminate the subminimum wage for employees based on their disability or age.
Items.MatterName: Eliminate the subminimum wage for employees based on their disability or age. (S. 1828 /A. 3103)

Items.Title: Resolution calling on New York City health care institutions to contract with industrial laundry companies that respect workers’ legal rights and adhere to area standards for wages and benefits.
Items.MatterName: New York City health care institutions to contract with industrial laundry companies that respect workers’ legal rights and adhere to area standards for wages and benefits.
